entity.name: Abhishek Kumar Singh
entity.description: We are an edtech startup on a mission to simplify data science and business intelligence through automation. Our flagship project focuses on intelligent data cleaning and instant dashboard generation — making data analysis as easy as clicking a button.

projects.name: AutomatedCleaning
projects.description:
It is an AI-powered tool that automatically cleans messy datasets — whether they come from Excel, CSVs, or databases — and transforms them into actionable dashboards similar to Power BI. It supports anomaly detection, column type inference, imputation, duplicate resolution, and intelligent chart generation.

Designed for non-tech users and analysts, AutomatedCleaning reduces days of manual work to minutes.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for details.
Support us on PayPal for making any donations.

plans.name: Hosting Support
plans.description: Covers our cloud and server hosting costs to keep the platform running smoothly.

plans.name: Developer Compensation
plans.description: Helps us pay a part-time developer to maintain and improve the product.

plans.name: Goodwill Plan
plans.description: Pay any amount you wish to show support for open innovation in data automation.

plans.name: Scale-Up Supporter
plans.description: A generous one-time contribution of $10,000 will directly support platform scaling, hiring full-time engineers, and launching new enterprise-grade features.

history.description: We're just getting started — your support will help build the future of automated analytics.
